title: (x) Classic Corn Flakes - hand-drawn {Mike Y}
content:
A little help on this classic Kellogg's Corn Flakes logo? I believe it's from the 30s or 40s.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [corn\_flakes.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202114025/http:/typophile.com/files/corn_flakes.jpg) | 34.86 KB |
author: jrmckean

comments.content:
Being from that era, it would have been hand-drawn by a lettering artist. Now you can find similar digital styles by searching for Gothic Sans faces.

- Mike Yanega
